  • java.lang.Object
    • tijos.framework.devicecenter.TiI2CMaster

  • public class TiI2CMaster
extends java.lang.Object
    The TiI2CMaster for devicecenter of framework.

        public static TiI2CMaster open(int portID)
                        throws java.io.IOException
        Open the TiI2CMaster port by port id,and return the object
        Parameters:
        portID - port id[IN], range:0-3
        Returns:
        TiI2CMaster object
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - If a TiI2CMaster error occurs

      • read

        public void read(int address,
                 byte[] data,
                 int offset,
                 int len)
          throws java.io.IOException
        Read the bytes data from salve with address
        Parameters:
        address - slave address[IN],,range:0-1023, 7bits address without R/W flag
        data - data array[OUT]
        offset - data offset[IN]
        len - data length[IN]
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - If a TiI2CMaster error occurs
        java.lang.ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException - If array index out of range

      • read

        public void read(int address,
                 byte[] data,
                 int offset,
                 int len,
                 boolean repeated)
          throws java.io.IOException
        Read the bytes data from salve with address
        Parameters:
        address - slave address[IN],range:0-1023, 7bits address without R/W flag
        data - data array[OUT]
        offset - data offset[IN]
        len - data length[IN]
        repeated - need repeat, if repeated == true, no stop; if repeated == false, have stop
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - If a TiI2CMaster error occurs
        java.lang.ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException - If array index out of range

      • read

        public void read(int address,
                 int subAddress,
                 byte[] data,
                 int offset,
                 int len)
          throws java.io.IOException
        Read the bytes data from salve with address and sub address
        Parameters:
        address - slave address[IN],range:0-1023, 7bits address without R/W flag
        subAddress - sub address[IN], range:0-65535
        data - data array[OUT]
        offset - data offset[IN]
        len - data length[IN]
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - If a TiI2CMaster error occurs
        java.lang.ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException - If array index out of range

      • setBaudRate

        public void setBaudRate(int baud)
                 throws java.io.IOException
        Set the baud rate, have platform dependencies
        Parameters:
        baud - baud rate[IN] baud:100,100Kbps, standard speed, default baud:400,400Kbps, fast speed baud:3400,3.4Mbps, high speed
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - If a TiI2CMaster error occurs
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - If baud value out of range

        public void write(int address,
                  byte[] data,
                  int offset,
                  int len)
           throws java.io.IOException
        Write the bytes data to salve with address
        Parameters:
        address - slave address[IN],range:0-1023, 7bits address without R/W flag
        data - data array or null[IN]
        offset - data offset[IN]
        len - data length[IN]
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - If a TiI2CMaster error occurs
        java.lang.ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException - If array index out of range

                  byte[] data,
                  int offset,
                  int len,
                  boolean repeated)
           throws java.io.IOException
        Write the bytes data to salve with address
        Parameters:
        address - slave address[IN],range:0-1023, 7bits address without R/W flag
        data - data array or null[IN]
        offset - data offset[IN]
        len - data length[IN]

                  int subAddress,
                  byte[] data,
                  int offset,
                  int len)
